name: SuperShooter
description:
Anytime anywhere, enjoy shooting.

Provide 4 kinds of game mode, serve the different favorite player

Friends play mode: Invite friends to shoot

Timed mode: shooting score in the 60S.
Combo mode: keep shooting until you don't. See who's the three-point king
Practice mode: in this mode, you can shoot quietly and enjoy the pleasure of scoring. You can also concentrate on the practice, find out the best shot of the shot, to become a superb player.

If you encounter any problems in the game, contact bendary@foxmail.com
